ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: $Setup.loan__ACH_Parameters__c.loan__Use_Lock_Based_ACH__c = true && ISPICKVAL(loan__Transaction_Type__c , 'Recurring ACH') && loan__ACH_Start_Date__c > loan__OT_ACH_Debit_Date__c && ISNEW()
ValidationRule.errorMessage: ACH start date should be less than Debit date.
